OOC: Very good.  Give the man a cigar.  well no don't tobacco is nasty... but 
i shouldn't say that too loud  too many tobacco farms in this town.

::Firaxis::
       He followed her, nodding at what she said.  He followed her into the 
tunnel and upwards toward the fresh air.

--part1_18c.a89581a.2a5f9f9e_boundary
